org.jclouds.abiquo.monitor.internal
Class BaseVirtualApplianceMonitor

java.lang.Object
  org.jclouds.abiquo.internal.BaseMonitoringService
      org.jclouds.abiquo.monitor.internal.BaseVirtualApplianceMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
MonitoringService, VirtualApplianceMonitor
@Singleton
public class BaseVirtualApplianceMonitor
extends BaseMonitoringService
implements VirtualApplianceMonitor

Default monitor for VirtualAppliance objects.

Author:
Ignasi Barrera
